description.en:
Adjust storage capacities for silos, productions, husbandries, and vehicles.
Supports multiplayer with permission system - admins can modify any storage, farm managers can modify their farm's storage.
Features: - Press K at any storage or vehicle to open capacity dialog - Press K in Production or Animals menu to adjust selected facility - Walk near vehicles (trailers, harvesters, tankers) to adjust fill unit capacities - Edit capacity for each fill type - Settings persist across save/load - Full multiplayer support
Supported: - Silos and warehouses - Production storage - Husbandry input/output (straw, water, milk, manure) - Animal food troughs - Vehicle fill units (trailers, harvesters, sprayers, tankers)
Not Supported: - Bunker silos (terrain heap-based) - Pallets and bales (object storage) - Vehicle pallets and big bags (products, not containers) - Leveler fill units (internal buffers)
Console Commands (Placeables): - ascList: Show all storages - ascSet <index> <fillType> <capacity>: Set capacity - ascReset <index> [fillType]: Reset to original
Console Commands (Vehicles): - ascListVehicles: Show all vehicles with fill units - ascSetVehicle <index> <fillUnit> <capacity>: Set capacity - ascResetVehicle <index> [fillUnit]: Reset to original
Changelog: 0.3.0.0 (Alpha): - Added vehicle capacity adjustment (trailers, harvesters, etc.) - Walk near any vehicle with fill units to press K and adjust - Console commands for vehicles
0.2.0.0 (Alpha): - Added K button to Production and Animals in-game menus - Adjust capacity directly from menu without approaching storage - Fixed dialog overlay issue (now properly covers menu background)
0.1.0.0: - Initial alpha release - GUI dialog for viewing and editing storage capacities - Inline editing with double-click or Enter - Full multiplayer support with permissions - Console commands for advanced users
Documentation: https://github.com/rittermod/FS25_AdjustStorageCapacity
